title: Everything in game is delayed but i dont have high ping... what is going on?
body: So basically champ select works fine im able to choose my champ and skin but i went in game once and everything is delayed. I see all the champs everywhere moving but their attacks are delayed and their health doesnt drop for a while and then minons arent dying but teleporting everywhere. I then proceeded to go in custom game and it worked fine I go in game again and it happens AGAIN please help

replies.body: It sounds like you're having some input delay here, which can happen with a network issue that's having trouble maintaining a connection.  I suggest running a [log reader](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/209765743-Connection-Troubleshooting-Log-Reader) for these games for an overview of your situation.  The results will also offer some troubleshooting tips for your issue.  Let me know what you come up with!
